name: bookit-extension
description: Browser extension to bookmark all tabs

scripts.build:chrome: cp manifest_chrome.json manifest.json && echo 'Chrome build ready'
scripts.build:firefox: cp manifest_firefox.json manifest.json && echo 'Firefox build ready'
scripts.build:all: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.dev:chrome: npm run build:chrome && echo 'Ready for Chrome development'
scripts.dev:firefox: npm run build:firefox && echo 'Ready for Firefox development'
